events.name: TakaTaka Club: Trash Pick Up
events.description: Pick up trash with the Taka Taka Club off the first pull-out along the Angeles Crest Highway. Contact on Instagram or email for details.

events.name: TreePeople: San Francisquito Nevin's Restoration
events.description: Enjoy a morning of stewardship immersed in chaparral wildlands by helping protect and reintroduce Nevinâ€™s barberry, a federally endangered species, to its former habitat. This project is in coordination with the California Botanic Garden in the Sierra Pelona Mountains of the Angeles National Forest

events.name: TreePeople: San Francisquito Chaparral Restoration
events.description: Join TreePeople and the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation in the beautiful San Francisquito Canyon of the Angeles National Forest. Below the rocky hills of the Sierra Pelona mountains, next to a creek leading to the Santa Clara River, we will be restoring an area of the wildlands damaged by the Copper Fire by caring for the native chaparral plants which provide deer, coyotes and others with food and shelter.

events.name: MWBA: Gabrielino Trail Work
events.description:
Gabrielino Trail (Between Ken Burton and Long Canyon) trail work. Mountain bike required. Equipment and lunch provided.

events.name: TreePeople: Alder Saddle Reforestation
events.description: Join TreePeople in the Angeles National forest to care for pine tree at high elevation. Enjoy beautiful views while practicing stewardship of the land in an effort to re-establish pine stands near the Bobcat fire scar. https://www.treepeople.org/volunteer/
